body.p:
The PDU has these transient suppression options:
The PDU can incorporate a Surge Protective Device (SPD) Type 2 rated either 100 kA or 200 kA on the input to or output from the transformer. The SPD complies with ANSI/UL1449 4th edition,Type 1 SPD; ANSI/IEEE C62.411, C62.41.2, C62.45; and UL96A Lightning Protection.
Input An optional SPD protects the input to the transformer (standard 480VAC 3-phase, other voltages available). Input is typically a Delta (3W+G) configuration.
Output An optional SPD protects the transformer output to the distribution subfeed circuits (standard 208/120V, other voltages available). Output is typically a WYE (4W + G) configuration
A 9" square transient suppression plate can be installed under the PDU to protect against electromagnetic interference and noise.
